name: ResearchSubject
title: ResearchSubject
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Biomedical Research and Regulation)
description: A physical entity which is the primary unit of operational and/or administrative interest in a study.

elements.name: ResearchSubject
elements.description: A physical entity which is the primary unit of operational and/or administrative interest in a study.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifiers assigned to this research subject for a study.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The current state of the subject.

elements.name: period
elements.description: The dates the subject began and ended their participation in the study.

elements.name: study
elements.description: Reference to the study the subject is participating in.

elements.name: individual
elements.description: The record of the person or animal who is involved in the study.

elements.name: assignedArm
elements.description: The name of the arm in the study the subject is expected to follow as part of this study.

elements.name: actualArm
elements.description: The name of the arm in the study the subject actually followed as part of this study.

elements.name: consent
elements.description: A record of the patient's informed agreement to participate in the study.
